stepOne.title: Step 1: Start analysis or load existing analysis
stepOne.incorrectParameterFile: The parmeter file you are using is corrupted. Please try again.

text.textOne: The 'Decision Support' tool considers the supply situation in services of general interest according to your self-selected criteria.
text.textTwo: As a result, you receive various layers on the supply situation. These can be used, for example, to assess the supply situation, analyze demand, and identify structural spatial differences.
